original: @345b ` // stong chen mo rab tu 'joms pa las gsungs pa'i smon lam bzhugs//
analyzed: stong chen mo rab tu joms ba las gsungs ba smon lam

original: # // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dkon(d) mchog gsum la phyag tshal lo

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid dang // rang rgyal dag gi gzi brjid dang // dgra bcom rnams kyi mthu dag dang // gsang sngags 'dzin pa thams cad dang // sh'a ri'i bu yi shes rab dang // mood gal bu yi rdzu 'phrul dang // ma 'gags pa yi mig dang ni //
analyzed: sangs rgya kun gyi gzi brjid dang rang rgyal dag gi gzi brjid dang dgra joms rnams kyi mthu dag dang gsang sngags dzin ba thams cad dang sha ri bu yi shes rab dang mood gal bu yi rdzu phrul dang ma gag ba yi mig dang ni

original: 'od srungs sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang // koondi n+ya'i sngar thob dang // kun dga' bo yi thos pa dang // tshangs pa yi ni byams pa dang // rgya byin gyi ni dbang rnams dang // 'jig rten skyong gi yul rnams dang // dbang phyug chen po'i stobs rnams dang //
analyzed: d srungs sbyong ba yon tan dang koondi n+ya sngar thob dang kun dga bo yi thos ba dang tshangs ba yi ni byams ba dang rgya byin gyi ni dbang rnams dang jig rten skyong gi yul rnams dang dbang phyug chen po stobs rnams dang

original: sde dpon rnams kyi mthu dag dang // 'phrog ma'i gzi brjid rdzu 'phrul dang // de dag rnams kyi mthu dang gzis //
analyzed: sde dpon rnams kyi mthu dag dang phrog ma gzi brjid rdzu phrul dang de dag rnams kyi mthu dang gzis

original: bdag gi dug ni dug med shog /'phags pa stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa las gsungs pa'i smon @346a * //
analyzed: bdag gi dug ni dug med shog ba stong chen po rab tu joms ba las gsungs ba smon
